name: Don Bigô & Phantonette
description:
Phantonette Ataca Novamente!

A famosa assassina vitimou dezenas nos últimos meses! A ela são atribuídas as mais  terríveis barbáries ao que o departamento de polícia contratou o prestigiado detetive Don Bigô em caráter emergencial.

Desvende o mistério de sua entidade nessa apavorante caçada no escuro, em um grade tabuleiro retrô isométrico repleto de armas, facões e pantufas.

Phantonette Strikes Again!

The famous killer has victimized dozens in recent months! The most terrible barbarities are attributed to her, which is why the police department has hired the prestigious detective Don Bigô on an emergency basis.

Unravel the mystery of her identity in this terrifying hunt in the dark, on a large retro isometric game board full of weapons, machetes, and slippers.

(Lyrics for background song:) He wont rest until she's locked In jail Even if he is scared And pale For no matter what he do And no matter where he's at He cannot escape From madam Phantonette And she wont let he get away Unharmed She will hunt him and screw Him hard For no matter what she do'n Doesn't matter where she go She wont let escape Of mister Don Bigô

Credits:

  • Gustavo Vieira Ferreira (art, PO, music)
  • João Pedro Buzzo (programming)
  • Lucas Oliveira Castro (programming)

Special thanks to Eduarda Tuboy Nardin for drawing the banner

Assets:

Gun sound
